give him continued use of your kidneys. For nobody has any right to use
your kidneys unless you give him such a right; and nobody has the right
against you that you shall give him this right—if you do allow him to go on
using your kidneys, this is a kindness on your part, and not something he
can claim from you as his due. Nor has he any right against anybody else
